channel.title: About Safe Zones

item.title: About Safe Zones
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

OK,

I was wondering how to make safe zones in a DeltaScape source. What I did so far was make the whole map a pk zone and i want to add like a home safe zone, a shops, stuff like that. Here’s what I did so far in public void isInWilderness to make the whole map pk:

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715) { return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942)) { return true; <-- I changed false to true (originally false) } } return true; }
So would I just make a new “Type” and make its value false?
If not can u supply me with a way I can do it or find out? Thanks people!

Read full topic
